how-it-works-first-step: Upload your exams files to our cloud
how-it-works-second-step: Our AI will classify your images
how-it-works-third-step: Receive a complete report in PDF
we-use-ai: We use Artificial Intelligence to classify risk of COVID-19 based on X-ray or Tomography exams
you-have-to-add-at-least-one: You have to add at least one file to classify...
alert-10-files: You can add only 10 files per report!
alert-success: Your report is ready! The download will start automatically.
important-validation: Important! This software is not yet validated. The results may be not accurate. We strongly recommend an analysis of the results by a radiologist. Do NOT take medical decisions only based on the outcomes of the report.
add-your-files: Add your files and get a case report sample! You can add up to 10 images at a time. We support JPEG images preferably on a 1:1 resolution scale (squared).
if-you-want-to-try-1: If you want to try and do not have any image to submit, feel free to download a COVID Infected image sample
important-validation-no-html: Important! This software is not yet validated. The results may be not accurate. We strongly recommend an analysis of the results by a radiologist. Do NOT take medical decisions only based on the outcomes of the report.
files-loading: Wait a moment, we are analyzing your files...
